00210     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00220     template<class Archive>
00221     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00222     {
00223         // If Archive is an output archive, then '&' resolves to '<<'
00224         // If Archive is an input archive, then '&' resolves to '>>'
00225         archive & mDurationOfSimulation;
00226         archive & mTotalTimeStepsInSimulation;
00227         archive & mTimeStepsElapsed;
00228         archive & mEndTimeAndNumberOfTimeStepsSet;
00229         archive & mCurrentTime;
00230         archive & mEndTime;
